succulentTools.name: Precision Watering Can
succulentTools.description: 500ml squeeze bottle with narrow spout for precise succulent watering without getting water on leaves.

succulentTools.name: Succulent Soil Mix
succulentTools.description: Premium well-draining soil blend with perlite and pumice, specifically formulated for cacti and succulent health.

succulentTools.name: Mini Gardening Tool Set
succulentTools.description: Three-piece stainless steel tool set with trowel, spoon, and rake, perfectly sized for small succulents.

succulentTools.name: Grow Light LED Lamp
succulentTools.description: Full spectrum LED grow light with adjustable brightness timer, and settings for optimal indoor succulent growth indoors.

succulentTools.name: Terracotta Drainage Pots Set
succulentTools.description: Set of six small terracotta pots with drainage holes and saucers for healthy succulent root growth.

succulentTools.name: Succulent Fertilizer
succulentTools.description: Organic liquid fertilizer with low-nitrogen formula specifically balanced for healthy cacti and succulent growth.
